entry.title: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra - Flexible Tempered Glass
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caseco
Type: Screenflex
Price: 14.99

  • Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra Flexible Tempered Glass securely covers the whole screen of your Phone.
  • The top layer of the glass has an anti fingerprint screen.
  • Flexible Glass is scratch-resistant and remains tough under any impact.
  • Easy to clean and install bubble-free screen as the glass is flexible.
  • Maintains the original native touch experience with a barely-there thickness of 0.01 mm
  • Box Includes 6H Flexible glass, Tempered glass alignment tool and a Cleaning Kit.
